data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

data.author: Audrey Hepburn
data.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.

data.author: Arthur Rubinstein
data.quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

data.author: Anne Hathaway
data.quote: We all have two lives. The second one starts when we realize we only have one.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: Life is a progress, and not a station.

data.author: Emily Dickinson
data.quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: It is not the length of life, but depth of life.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: Vision without execution is just hallucination.

data.author: Kevin Kruse
data.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.

data.author: Socrates
data.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

data.author: Doug Hutchison
data.quote: I think being in love with life is a key to eternal youth.

data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
data.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.

data.author: Emily Dickinson
data.quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.

data.author: Joan Rivers
data.quote: I enjoy life , I don’t care if it’s good things or bad things. That means you’re alive.

data.author: Sarah Louise Delany
data.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.

data.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
data.quote: Life doesn’t require that we be the best, only that we try our best.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: There isn't a way things should be. There's just what happens, and what we do.
